project_preview_description.text: This is a clone of the famous Hacker News Forum from Y Combinator

project_description.text: This is a clone of the famous Hacker News Forum from Y Combinator. This project consumes the Official Hacker News API to fetch real time data for several type of stories. It handles pseudo-pagination, and several error cases.

siteMetadata.title: Juan Murillo
